Hi Mike

Thanks for some really good input!

> - design a _single_ media type to handle all your documents
Yes!

> - if you need to return collections, consider _always_ returning
collections of one or more
Okay. But collections are always one or more? I guess you mean; also return 
one-or-more even if it's only a "one item" URL?

> - always include an root child element called <error />
Yes.

> - when going through the design details, never include a real URI,
Yes!

> - include search/query element definitions within your media type.
That's an interesting idea. Much like always have a "Search" entry on every 
page on a website.

> - include support for "send" elements (POST PUT DELETE)
That will be later. So far it is querying only. But, yes, certainly.

> - design your document as "format-agnostic" as possible
Will try.

/J�rn
